item.title: Just How Fast Is Faster?
item.description: After I installed and tried the Zulu Embedded JVM on my ARTIK-520 this morning I noticed that it felt faster. It seemed faster. But was it really faster? And if so, how much faster? So I went looking for some Java Benchmark tests to run. I chose the DaCapo Benchmark for this. Why? Because google, that’s why. Here’s what the DaCapo Benchmark says about itself*: This benchmark suite is intended as a tool for Java benchmarking by the programming language, memory management and computer architecture communities.
